xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp

接口 FsTcpServerHandler


  • public interface FsTcpServerHandler
    TCP/IP network handler in server endpoint.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onClose(FsTcpChannel channel, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Callback when a channel was closed.
      default void onException(FsNetServerException exception)
      Callback when an exception occurs on the server.
      default void onException(FsTcpChannel channel, java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Callback when an exception occurs in the channel.
      default void onLoop(FsTcpChannel channel, boolean hasNewData, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Callback for each read loop of channel.
      default void onOpen(FsTcpChannel channel)
      Callback when a new channel was opened.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onException

        default void onException(FsNetServerException exception)
        Callback when an exception occurs on the server.
        参数:
        exception - the exception for server

      • onOpen

        default void onOpen(FsTcpChannel channel)
        Callback when a new channel was opened.
        参数:
        channel - the channel

      • onClose

        default void onClose(FsTcpChannel channel,
                     java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Callback when a channel was closed.
        参数:
        channel - the channel
        buffer - remaining buffer of the channel, readonly and initial position is 0

      • onException

        default void onException(FsTcpChannel channel,
                         java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                         java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Callback when an exception occurs in the channel.
        参数:
        channel - the channel
        throwable - the exception
        buffer - remaining buffer of the channel, readonly and initial position is 0

      • onLoop

        default void onLoop(FsTcpChannel channel,
                    boolean hasNewData,
                    java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Callback for each read loop of channel.

        Server has a list of handlers, if there has new data read from remote endpoint, FsTcpChannelHandler.onMessage(FsTcpChannel, Object) will be called for each handler. Only all onMessage method of handlers have been called, then this method would be called.

        If an exception is thrown, onException(FsTcpChannel, Throwable, ByteBuffer) will be called.

        参数:
        channel - the channel
        hasNewData - whether there has new data read in current loop
        buffer - remaining buffer of the channel, readonly and initial position is 0
